name: Summer Breaker
description:
Made for the HaxeJam 2022: Summer Jam

Theme : 

Sources : Get the sources on GitHub

Language : Haxe

Engine : HaxeFlixel

Controls : Left Arrow go to the left, Right Arrow go to the right

Code : by me

Graphism :  by ATB Man

Development duration : 9h22min

Post mortem :

HaxeFlixel is a very interesting tool, and it is very complete. I had nothing to do by hand, everyting was already made available by the engine. I really appreciate that. Being able to export so easily to html5 is a game changer for some one participating in a game jam. 

I find that engine very usefull when working in a jam.
